Package org.anchoranalysis.feature.calculate.cache

Interface FeatureSessionCache<T extends FeatureInput>

Type Parameters:
T - feature-input
public interface FeatureSessionCache<T extends FeatureInput>
A context in which to calculate features while caching certain duplicated internal calculations among the features.

When a user calculates a a single feature, they often are calculating other features at the same time (on one or more objects). This creates possibilities for various different forms of caching of results, and different initialization strategies.

This class represents one such bunch of calculations. Different implementations provide different strategies.

Each session-cache may contain "child" caches for particular string identifiers. This provides a hierarchy of caches and sub-caches as many features change the underlying objects that are being calculated, and need separate space in the cache.

A call to {invalidate() removes any existing caching (also in the children) and guarantees the next calculation will be fresh/

Author:
Owen Feehan

    FeatureSessionCalculator<T> calculator()
    A means of calculating feature values using this cache.

    void invalidate()
    Invalidates existing caches so all calculations occur freshly
    void invalidateExcept​(Set<ChildCacheName> childCacheNames)
    Invalidates existing caches so all calculations occur freshly - except some particular child-caches who are not invalidated

  • Method Details

    • init

      void init​(FeatureInitParams featureInitParams, Logger logger)
      Initialises the cache. Should always be called once before any calculations occur
      Parameters:
      featureInitParams - params for initialization
      logger - logger

    • childCacheFor

      <V extends FeatureInput> FeatureSessionCache<V> childCacheFor​(ChildCacheName childName, Class<? extends FeatureInput> inputType, CacheCreator cacheCreator)
      Gets/creates a child-cache for a given name

      This function trusts the caller to use the correct type for the child-cache.

      Type Parameters:
      V - params-type of the child cache to found
      Parameters:
      childName - name of the child-cache
      inputType - the type of V
      cacheCreator - factory for creating a cache
      Returns:
      the existing or new child cache of the given name
